decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing Enigmatic Incarnation to constantly tutor for powerful creatures or disruption spells. By sacrificing lower-cost permanents, the deck can search for higher-cost threats such as Overlord of the Floodpits, Overlord of the Hauntwoods, and Overlord of the Mistmoors. The deck also includes cards like Assassin's Trophy, Fatal Push, and Deputy of Detention to control the board and remove threats. With Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion, the deck gains additional value and flexibility by flickering creatures and permanents for additional triggers.

The main idea of this deck is to utilize the Retraction Helix combo with cards like Rona, Herald of Invasion and Mox Amber to generate mana and cast multiple spells in a turn. By bouncing permanents back to hand with Retraction Helix and using cards like Stormchaser's Talent and Stock Up to draw more cards, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The inclusion of disruptive cards like This Town Ain't Big Enough helps to control the board while finishing the game with powerful creatures like Thundertrap Trainer and Kitsa, Otterball Elite.
